args.natural_language_statement: Suppose f : ùîª ‚Üí ùîª is holomorphic and f(0) = 0, then |f'(0)| ‚â§ 1. {"ok": true, "lean_translation": "import Mathlib
open Set Function Metric
open UnitDisc

/-- Suppose $f \colon \mathbb{D} \to \mathbb{D}$ is holomorphic and $f(0) = 0$, then $\lvert f'(0)\rvert \leq 1$. -/
theorem abs_deriv_le_one_of_maps_zero {f : ùîª ‚Üí ùîª} (hf : Differentiable ùîª f) (h : f 0 = 0) :
    Complex.abs (f' hf 0) ‚â§ 1 := sorry"}

args.content:
import Mathlib

open Metric

/-- Schwarz lemma: if f : ‚ÑÇ ‚Üí ‚ÑÇ is differentiable on the unit disk, maps the unit disk into itself,
    and f 0 = 0, then |deriv f 0| ‚â§ 1. -/
theorem schwarz_lemma_unit_disk {f : ‚ÑÇ ‚Üí ‚ÑÇ}
  (hf : DifferentiableOn ‚ÑÇ f (Metric.ball (0:‚ÑÇ) 1))
  (hmap : ‚àÄ z, ‚Äñz‚Äñ < 1 ‚Üí ‚Äñf z‚Äñ < 1)
  (h0 : f 0 = 0) :
  Complex.abs (deriv f 0) ‚â§ 1 := by sorry
